snippet: As Brooklyn Heights has gentrified, the store has changed by expanding its stock of traditional Middle Eastern products to include specialty items from around the globe.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Sahadi's Importing Company, Brooklyn Heights grocery store offering hundreds of specialties and delicacies from around the world.
lead_paragraph: As Brooklyn Heights has gentrified, the store has changed by expanding its stock of traditional Middle Eastern products to include specialty items from around the globe.

headline.print_headline: Fresh and Frozen, Candied and Brined
headline.main: Sahadi’s Offers a World of Things That Can Be Put in a Jar
